metadata.title: CVE-2017-9179 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libautotrace.a in AutoTrace 0.31.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (invalid read and SEGV), related to the ReadImagefunction in input-bmp.c:425:14.

criterions.comment: autotrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
